name: FxColorGamutAPI_v2
desc: A protocol that handles plug-in queries to the host for the project's color gamut.

items.name: func colorMatrixFromDesiredRGBToYCbCr() -> FxMatrix44!
items.desc: Returns a color matrix that is appropriate for converting RGB values in the project's working gamut into YCbCr values.

items.name: func colorMatrixFromYCbCrToDesiredRGB() -> FxMatrix44!
items.desc: Returns a color matrix that is appropriate for converting RGB values from YCbCr to an RGB value in the project's working gamut.
